Name: Yeah Jam Fury
About the game: GET THE MANGO The Newgrounds classic Yeah Jam Fury now has a new permanent home on Steam! Test your speed and ingenuity in over 40 levels of smiling face blocks. Utilize all three of your egos to create blocks, scale walls, and destroy everything in the way of your righteous fruit! Default Control Scheme: A, D - move left, right W, Space - jump 1 - switch to Yeah 2 - switch to Jam 3 - switch to Fury Q - quickswitch M - see mango location P - Pause And remember, controls are always available in the settings menu. Enjoyed this game? Check out its sequel below! /
